athi wu warshawa hethuwen maradana ha kolambaa kotuwa dumriya sthana athara dumriya marga sangnya paddhathi akriyawima nisa pradhana margaye ha puththalam margaye dhawanayawimata niyamitha siyaluma dumriya paya bhagaye sita payakata aasanna kalayak pramada wi dhawanaya kerini.paswaru 3.30 ta pamana eeye (14) sawasa athi wu warshawa hethuwen dumriya warna sangnya paddhathi (panittu) kolambaa wathura pirima nisa me hethuwa athi wu bawa dumriya departhamenthuwe jyeshta niladhariyek dinamina ta pawasiya.kotuwa dumriya sthanayen niwes bala yana dahas gananakata pramada wi yamata siduwiya..

mita amatharawa gammanpila mahatha gana thawath katha apata athath apa me sandahan kara sitiye madhya hamu haraha me wana witath prasiddhiyata pathkara athi thorathuru pamanaya.

me thiththa kathawa sara bala kara hewath rajapaksha aanduwe gaththanta bonnata puluwan lesa shandi kara dinamina idiripath karanne mese ya: "shri lankawe wathman thaththwaya pilibandawa awadhanaya yomukala derate niyojithayan me rate pawathi gatumwalin pasuwa jathika prathisandhanayakata yomu wima sandaha honda awasthawak nirmanaya wi thibena bawatada piligena thibe.
janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha me wana wita 2017 wasara sandaha wana ayawaya kiyawima sandaha ekwemin randi sitinne parlimenthuwa thulayi.
thama hisa wanu aya, pilissanu was genipettiyak sewimata yomu wuwa ya.
